data.text:
@esthermar27 You should come out of it soon i think 
I know it sucks when you take all the measures to avoid it
@esthermar27 keep resting up, Esther, & i really hope you'll start to feel better soon - good to see you have a full nursing staff on hand, too 😉
@esthermar27 Been there twice myself, take care, rest, painkillers, fluids and pets 🤞🏻😊😴

@Dombeaud22 At home we have all managed to avoid it for the last 2 years and now when the situation was supposedly better and still using masks, hand sanitizer etc. boom! we are now all sick 😖 Fortunately the girls are already feeling much better.
@esthermar27 I'm surprised...with all the cases we had in our schools
@Dombeaud22 Oh you take care my dear. I hope you never get it âœ¨💙
@esthermar27 I know love...my mom and sister had it...rest as much as possible
@shallowgreys They are really appreciated. Thank you 🖤xx
@Dombeaud22 Thank you Dominique. It's taking much longer than I thought 😒💙
